//post create component - handles post creation import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; import { PostServiceService } from '../post-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-post-create', templateUrl: './post-create.component.html', styleUrls: ['./post-create.component.css'] }) export class PostCreateComponent { //constructor constructor(public postservice: PostServiceService) {} //method to add post onaddpost(postform: NgForm){ //post invalid if (postform.invalid) { alert('Invalid') return } else //post valid { alert('Posts Sucessfully Created') //get current user's name const username = localStorage.getItem('username'); this.postservice.addpost_service( postform.value.enteredTitle, postform.value.enteredDescription, postform.value.enteredDepartments, postform.value.enteredProgress, username ) postform.resetForm() } } }
